description:
Implement a one-click 'Everything about [Dossier]' view that aggregates all connections to a dossier in a structured summary. Sections include: Related Dossiers (by relationship type), Documents (positions, MOUs, briefs), Work Items (tasks, commitments, intakes with status breakdown), Calendar Events, Key Contacts, and Activity Timeline. Include export capability for the complete dossier profile.

**Rationale (R8):** Users need a comprehensive view of all connections to a dossier without manually navigating multiple tabs. This provides executive-level overview for briefings and handoffs.
